column5: Hey All, I just got this in an email and then saw it on another site.  Thought I would share.  MUSTANG SURVIVAL ISSUES VOLUNTARY RECALL NOTICE ON MD2010 & MD2012 model 22LB Inflatable Personal Flotation Devices  http://www.mustangsurvival.com/22lb-product-notice
You had me worried there for a bit Phil, I just recentely purchased a new Mustang vest but had to go check it as I couldn't remember the model #  I'm OK though, mines an MD 3153...phew !!
wow very important phil as lots of guys are now wearing those !!! maybe the mods should post this as a sticky on top as i think this is very important thanks for the info...!!!
How many models to they have? I got a new one for Christmas, it's a #MD 2053.
bump 'cause it is important, thanks for letting us know!
